query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPSTW0301( MANDT, LIFNR, PERNO, INP_DT, TMCD, NAMEE, M_MH, A_MH, N_MH, GBN, TUIP_CHKA, TUIP_CHKB, DAEGI, SAYU, BIGO, MDATE, MTIME, ERNAM, INS_GBN ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #LIFNR#, #PERNO#, #INP_DT#, #TMCD#, #NAMEE#, #M_MH#, #A_MH#, #N_MH#, #GBN#, #TUIP_CHKA#, #TUIP_CHKB#, #DAEGI#, #SAYU#, #BIGO#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #G_USER_ID#, 'S' )
